content.full_text: Bill of Sale from James A. Richerson to John Ferguson, 20 October 18311 This is to certify that I have soald all my Rite and title to thenew Salem ferrytoJohn fergusonthis20thof October 1831

footnotes.text: 1Abraham Lincoln only signed his name to this document.
